name: BBQ sauce
description: A viscous paste of different ingredients, this particular one is composed of a mixture of tomato paste with liquid smoke, onion powder, mustard, black pepper and sugar.

name: mayochup
description:
A viscous paste, it consists of a mixture of one part ketchup and two of mayonnaise. 
also known as ''pink sauce'' or simply ketchup-mayo mix or fry sauce.
